title: Rayearth (Magic Knight Rayearth OVA)
synopsis: The Earth lies darkened and deserted. Despite the best efforts of the film's heroine, Hikaru, the evil-filled castle of Cephiro has taken over the world and stands in the center of a lifeless Tokyo. Before the ice-witch Alcyone can take her revenge on Hikaru, she is rescued by Lantis, a young man who seals her into a magical maze where she is challenged to prove her powers while her friends are hunted down by Cephiro's warlocks.
voices: ['Shiina, Hekiru', 'Yoshida, Konami', 'Kasahara, Hiroko', 'Shiratori, Yuri', 'Kosugi, Juurouta', 'Ogata, Megumi', 'Yamazaki, Takumi', 'Sasaki, Nozomu', 'Kosugi, Juurouta', 'Ogata, Megumi']
staff: [['Motonaga, Keitarou', ['Director']], ['Hirano, Toshiki', ['Director', ' Storyboard']], ['Kobayashi, Katsuyoshi', ['Sound Director']], ['Urakami, Yasuo', ['Sound Director']]]
